question: Which Tuluva Dynasty ruler was contemporary of Babur ?
explanation:
An emperor of Vijayanagar empire, Krishna Dev Raya was the most illustrious ruler of Deccan and a contemporary of Babur. In his reign (1509 AD â€“1529 AD) the empire reached to its zenith in peace, order, power, prosperity and learning.
In the biography of Mughal Emperor Babur, \"Baburnama\", he described Krishna Dev Raya as the most powerful ruler of India.
